member.name: T:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter
member.summary: Represents an input adapter that reads measurements from a database table.

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.TableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the table name in the data source from which measurements are read.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.DbConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string used to connect to the data source.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.DataProviderString
member.summary: Gets or sets the data provider string used to connect to the data source.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.TimestampFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format used to read measurements from the data source.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.FramesPerSecond
member.summary: Gets or sets the framerate simulated by this adapter.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.SimulateTimestamps
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the timestamps should be simulated for the purposes of real-time concentration.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.CacheFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets a cache file name so that when defined, future data loads will be from cache instead of the database as an optimization.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets a flag that determines if this uses an asynchronous connection.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes this .

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.AttemptConnection
member.summary: Attempts to connect to this .

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.AttemptDisconnection
member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from this .

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoInputAdapter.GetShortStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a short one-line status of this .
member.param: Maximum length of the status message.

member.name: T:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter
member.summary: Represents an output adapter that archives measurements to a database.

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.TableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the table name in the data source used to archive data.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.DbConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string used to connect to the data source.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.DataProviderString
member.summary: Gets or sets the data provider string used to connect to the data source.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.TimestampFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format used to output measurement timestamps to the data source.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.BulkInsertLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of measurements to be collated into one insert statement.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.OutputIsForArchive
member.summary: Returns a flag that determines if measurements sent to this are destined for archival.

member.name: P:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets a flag that determines if this uses an asynchronous connection.

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes this .

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.AttemptConnection
member.summary: Attempts to connect to this .

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.AttemptDisconnection
member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from this .

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.GetShortStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a short one-line status of this .
member.param: Maximum length of the status message.

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.ProcessMeasurements(GSF.TimeSeries.IMeasurement[])
member.summary: Archives locally.

member.name: M:AdoAdapters.AdoOutputAdapter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
